General.Name: Hunan Tianrun Enterprises Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, operation, publishing, and promotion of online mobile games. The company also offers Youyipay billing services for mobile video, social networking, music, and reading; precision marketing services for finance, insurance, education, automobiles, games, and other industries; and property leasing and computer application services. In addition, it is involved in e-commerce and internet advertising accurate placement businesses; and online sales. The company was formerly known as Hunan Tianrun Enterprises Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd. in July 2016. Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Yueyang, China.
